name: The Gentleman's Guide To Cockfighting!
description:
In this beyond-batshit simulator, check your taste and common decency at the door as you inherit a gamecock - roooster farm, where it will be up to you to raise and train fighting chickens for bloody combat! Compete with other "Gentleman Sir's" in order to find out who's really cock of the walk!

CONTROLS:
W,A,S,D --- Move
SHIFT -- Run
E -- Interact
ESC -- PAUSE/Options Menu
